# tfe_agent_pool_allowed_projects

Adds and removes allowed projects on an agent pool.

~> **NOTE:** This resource requires using the provider with HCP Terraform and a HCP Terraform
for Business account.
[Learn more about HCP Terraform pricing here](https://www.hashicorp.com/products/terraform/pricing).

## Example Usage

```python
import constructs as constructs
import cdktf as cdktf
# Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
import ...gen.providers.tfe as tfe
class MyConvertedCode(cdktf.TerraformStack):
    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        tfe_organization_test_organization = tfe.organization.Organization(self, "test-organization",
            email="admin@company.com",
            name="my-org-name"
        )
        tfe_project_test_project = tfe.project.Project(self, "test-project",
            name="my-project-name",
            organization=cdktf.Token.as_string(tfe_organization_test_organization.name)
        )
        tfe_agent_pool_test_agent_pool = tfe.agent_pool.AgentPool(self, "test-agent-pool",
            name="my-agent-pool-name",
            organization=cdktf.Token.as_string(tfe_organization_test_organization.name),
            organization_scoped=False
        )
        tfe.agent_pool_allowed_projects.AgentPoolAllowedProjects(self, "allowed",
            agent_pool_id=cdktf.Token.as_string(tfe_agent_pool_test_agent_pool.id),
            allowed_project_ids=[cdktf.Token.as_string(tfe_project_test_project.id)]
        )
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `agent_pool_id` - (Required) The ID of the agent pool.
* `allowed_project_ids` - (Required) IDs of projects to be added as allowed projects on the agent pool.


## Import

A resource can be imported; use `<AGENT POOL ID>` as the import ID. For example:

```shell
terraform import tfe_agent_pool_allowed_projects.foobar apool-rW0KoLSlnuNb5adB
```
